input_full.title: Permissions review: enforce key behaviors through custom MCP
input_full.body:
Review and configure Claude Code permissions to enforce that key behaviors (git actions, lake controls) happen through our custom MCP tools rather than raw Bash commands.

**Goal:** Explicitly prevent the potential for the model to skip past tests or the archival process.

**Scope:**
- Review local permissions (project-level)
- Review global permissions (~/.claude/)
- Identify which operations should be MCP-gated vs allowed directly

---
🤖 Created with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
input_full.label: housekeeping
